channel.title: CVE Feed for Brocade -- SANnav
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Brocade -- SANnav

item.title: CVE-2023-31423|2024-09-27T14:24:13.370Z -- brocade -- sannav
item.description: Possible information exposure through log file vulnerability where sensitive fields are recorded in the configuration log without masking on Brocade SANnav before v2.3.0 and 2.2.2a. Notes: To access the logs, the local attacker must have access to an already collected Brocade SANnav "supportsave" outputs.
